com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation

Class ProductDaoWithJdbc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation.ProductDaoWithJdbc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductDao

    public class ProductDaoWithJdbc
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProductDao
    Created by kata on 2017.05.08..

    ProductDaoWithJdbc class!

    The ProductDaoWithJdbc class implements the ProductDao interface. Singleton class, can be created only one instance. You can do some database action: add new product to database, find a product by an id find a product by name remove product from the database by id
